column5: heres your chance to get a great deal on Raptor Tickets .  Primo seats (2) available . check it out in the Main Section , Tyler Auction... its for a great cause!   ADDED BONUS!  As an added incentive if the winning bid is $150 or more ( the price of one ticket!) I 'll throw in a day of guided fishing ( guided is used VERY loosely) on a lake of your choice and a species of your choice, from Georgian Bay , to Kawarthas to Simcoe . I 'll provide the gear if needed .  Keep Bidding !     TB
Find someone in need of the guided day...
